post.content: *************************************************************** Sponsored By: Rational Software *************************************************************** Free J2EE Application Code and Models Rational(R) Software has developed and packaged an extensible J2EE application as a reusable asset. We call it "PearlCircle." It's a set of industry best practices written for J2EE developers. In addition to having FREE access to code, models and requirements, see the application running and read about the architecture, structure, and process used for developing the application. Click now for details. http://s0b.bluestreak.com/ix.e?hy&s=37640&a=24477 ***************************************************************
post.title: Free J2EE Application Code and Models
